oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Gigantic Globe, Paris Exposition, 1900
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Giant globe at the 1900 Exposition Universelle (Universal Exposition).

Exposition ran from April 15 until November 12, 1900. Where motion pictures were first unveiled and where the escalator debuted. Also remembered for its influence on the Art Deco movement and architectural gems like Eliel Saarinen's Finnish pavilion.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Exposition universelle (1900 : Paris, France);
Exhibitions; Globes
